name: VVitching Hour: Six Hands
description:
Six Hands

The Handmaiden takes care of visitors.

Content Warning: May contain strong language, alcohol and drug usage, sexual content, violence, gore, abuse, and unsettling themes or imagery.

Approximate word count: 47,000

Release Date: January 13, 2023

Latest Version: 0.1.0

A VVitching Hour Story

VVitching Hour is a game series following a coven of witches who cross the occult in an industrializing world of dark arts and ever darker influences. As the witches gather in the forest, their encounters with mystery, wonder, and horror reveal secrets kept by people they come to know, as well as the desires creeping within themselves.

  • Short Story Experiences - Delve into a deep dark fantasy world in manageable portions, one short story at a time.
  • Exploration Rewards - Uncover additional lore and characters' secrets as you navigate freely between passages and explore the scenes around you.
  • Reading Resources - A map, inventory, journal, notebook, and observation list allow you to keep reference of your findings and progress.
